aboutme1: I am a <0>Front-end Developer</0> currently a student specializing in microcomputer systems and networks, based in Spain.
aboutme2: As an avid learner, I constantly seek opportunities to grow and explore new challenges. I love experimenting with new techniques and coding on personal projects, which helps me refine my skills and discover my unique style while making a real impact with the products I work with.
aboutme3: In this portfolio, <0>you can find samples of my recent works and the skills I am developing.</0> To me, every project here is a step toward mastering my craft, so I hope it is not only objectively great but that passion is shown in the final piece.
